pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ttl-cache### How to use it```shpip install ttl-cache``````pythonimport ttl_cache# use ttl_cache directly@ttl_cachedef expensive_operation(a, b): ... ... return SOME_RESULTexpensive_operation(xx, yy)expensive_operation(xx, yy) # prefer cached result# ... 60 seconds laterexpensive_operation(xx, yy) # compute again# or@ttl_cache(2.0) # cache the result in the next 2 seconds, default is 60.0 secondsdef expensive_operation(a, b): ... ...```
